Key Match Events: India beat Sri Lanka in the third T20 to sweep the three-match series 3-0
Washington Sundar took two wickets in the opening four balls of the Super Over
Suryakumar Yadav hit a four off the first ball of the Super Over
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was delayed due to rain
Others: India scored 137-9 after losing the toss and batting first
Sri Lanka made a good start with Pathum Nissanka scoring 26 off 27 before being caught off the bowling of Ravi Bishnoi
Rinku Singh and Yadav picked up four wickets for eight runs in their two overs of spin
Sundar, who claimed 2-23 before his Super Over exploits, was named player of the match
Yadav, in his first outing as Indiaâ€™s new T20 skipper, was named player of the series
